abstract: Three times a week over four weeks, the public will be invited to watch, through a one-way mirror, PJ Harvey and her bandmates write and arrange their tracks in a makeshift studio.
snippet: Three times a week over four weeks, the public will be invited to watch, through a one-way mirror, PJ Harvey and her bandmates write and arrange their tracks in a makeshift studio.

headline.main: PJ Harvey Turns Her Album Into an Art Installation
headline.print_headline: It’s an Album, It’s an Art Installation
